Episodes.Title: Red Sky at Night
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: CBI takes on a case involving a murdered state lobbyist, and Patrick helps in the case despite being preoccupied with Kristina's disappearance, presumably at the hands of Red John.

Episodes.Title: Cackle-Bladder Blood
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick reluctantly helps his brother-in-law with whom he has an uneasy relationship, when one of his marks in an investment scam turns up dead and he claims to be innocent.

Episodes.Title: The Blood on His Hands
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While CBI discovers that a homicide investigation leads back to Bret Stiles and his "Visualize" cult, Patrick receives a tip that provides proof that Red John has abducted Kristina Frye and that she is probably still alive.

Episodes.Title: Red Carpet Treatment
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick battles with a former defense attorney-turned courtroom talk show host as CBI tries to find the person who killed a convicted felon who was set free because of faulty DNA evidence.

Episodes.Title: The Red Ponies
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: When an ex-jockey is found dead, Patrick heads to the racetrack to find some answers.

Episodes.Title: Pink Chanel Suit
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The boyfriend of a federal judge's daughter is killed and the daughter is missing, but has she been kidnapped or did she do it?

Episodes.Title: Red Hot
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A Russian businessman dies in an explosion, and the prime suspect is a familiar face from CBI's past who also has a romantic interest in agent Lisbon.

Episodes.Title: Ball of Fire
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick is kidnapped by a person from one of his old cases who holds a grudge against him, and agent Lisbon is forced to make a deal with the Devil to find him.

Episodes.Title: Red Moon
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: CBI connects a small-town triple homicide to a cop killer, and a "psychic" who offers to help with the case suggests that the killer's actions are based on the moon cycle.

Episodes.Title: Jolly Red Elf
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While CBI investigates the death of a Santa, Patrick discovers that he is a suspect in the death of a cop killer who was set on fire while in police custody.

Episodes.Title: Bloodsport
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick and the team investigate the murder of a woman with ties to two professional Cage Fighters.

Episodes.Title: Bloodhounds
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick reluctantly works with a Decision Science consultant to solve a pair of murders that may be connected to a long-dormant serial killer.

Episodes.Title: Red Alert
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A man who claims that he was falsely accused of killing his wife holds Patrick and several other people hostage.

Episodes.Title: Blood for Blood
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A protected witness under Van Pelt's watch who is set to testify against a drug dealer is shot and killed, and the key to solving the mystery may involve getting to the victim's daughter's repressed memories.

Episodes.Title: Red Gold
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick works with special agent Hightower to figure out who killed a struggling gold prospector.

Episodes.Title: Red Queen
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Evidence in the murder of an antiques dealer found dead in a museum indicates that the suspect may be a member of the CBI team.

Episodes.Title: Bloodstream
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: LaRoche's unwelcome presence at a crime scene puts pressure on the team as they investigate the murder of a transplant doctor at a golf club.

Episodes.Title: The Red Mile
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: The body of CBI's latest murder victim is stolen, and the team later learns the the victim claimed that he had been abducted by aliens. Meanwhile, coroner Steiner surprisingly confides a surprising secret with Patrick.

Episodes.Title: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick is convinced that a manipulative matchmaker murdered her husband and sets out to prove it.

Episodes.Title: Redacted
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While CBI investigates the murder of an electronics store owner, Patrick tries to hide the secret that he hired a robber who unsuccessfully broke into LaRoche's home.

Episodes.Title: Like a Redheaded Stepchild
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Rigsby is forced to turn to his ex-con father to help solve the murder of a prison guard.

Episodes.Title: Rhapsody in Red
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: While CBI investigates the murder of a concert violinist, Cho helps a boy who is searching for clues that could prove his imprisoned father's innocence.

Episodes.Title: Strawberries and Cream: Part 1
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: A robber with a bomb attached to him is blown up in front of a convenience store, and CBI soon discovers that there may be connections between this case and Red John and agent Hightower.

Episodes.Title: Strawberries and Cream: Part 2
Episodes.Actors: Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Tim Kang
Episodes.Plot: Patrick trades Hightower's secret location to Laroche for the four remaining names on his list. The team then sets up a trap to uncover Red John's real informant, leading to a possible face-to-face showdown between Patrick and Red...
